page.title: 13The Moorland Links Hotel.
page.content: The three star Moorland Links Hotel, built in 1934, is one of a group of nine hotels owned by Forestdale Hotels. It stands in nine acres.It is run by 40-50 staff. Three chefs are employed in the kitchens and preparation staff from the kitchens are attending a day release course at a catering college and two others are on a Youth Training Scheme. A full time gardener has recently been employed. Accomodation comprises 31 bedrooms, 3 conference rooms, restuarant and bar for residents and non residents.Facilities include video, swimming pool, tennis courts, and reduced rates for guests for horse riding and golf.There are usually 40-50 guests per night. Bed + Breakfast is Â£32 single, Â£38 double.An annual summer fair is held for the benefit of local charities.
